Foreign diplomats visit Jangsan Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
Foreign diplomats visit Jangsan Revolutionary Site 
    Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The economic and commercial councillors corps here visited the Jangsan Revolutionary Site on Monday on the occasion of the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il.
 There he personally guided the Wasandong-Ryongsong road expansion project (May-June 1961) during his revolutionary activities at Kim Il Sung University.    
 The guests looked round the historic buildings where Kim Jong Il personally participated in the project and wisely led students and servicemen to complete it ahead of schedule.

articles.title: Preparatory committee formed in Indonesia
articles.content:
Preparatory committee formed in Indonesia 
    Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- An inaugural ceremony of the preparatory committee for celebrating February 16 was held by the nationalists union of Indonesia on February 6.
 The ceremony set a period of celebration and decided to hold multifarious celebrations.

Work of Kim Jong Il published in Russia
articles.content:
Work of Kim Jong Il published in Russia 
    Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Famous work of leader Kim Jong Il "our socialism centred on the masses shall not perish" was published in booklet by the publishing house of the International Bookmen's Union of Russia.
 The work was made public on May 5, Juche 80 (1991).

articles.title: Three major reforms urged in South Korea
articles.content:
Three major reforms urged in South Korea 
    Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The people's solidarity for abolition of the "Security Law" and other citizens' organisations of South Korea called a joint press conference on February 7 and urged the abolition of the "Security Law" and the institution of a law on prevention of corruption and a law on the human rights committee, according to a CBS report from Seoul.
 The organisations said that the South Korean authorities have not yet made clear their position  even after they promised the people to deal with three major reforms and that they should no longer delay the fulfilment of the task which all the people want.

articles.title: 21st century described as century of global independence
Seminar on Juche idea to be held in Africa
articles.content:
Seminar on Juche idea to be held in Africa 
    Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the Juche idea for the independent development of Africa in the 21st century is slated to take place in Uganda from Feb. 13 to 14 under the sponsorship of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on the occasion of the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il.
 This was announced by the preparatory committee of the seminar in a press statement released on Feb. 8.    
 According to the statement, the seminar to be participated in by delegates and prominent figures from various African countries will discuss theoretical and practical issues arising in the struggle for achieving independent development in Africa, guided by the Juche idea, the great guiding idea in the 21st century.
